metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18764 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable arbitrary memory read vulnerability exists in the MQTT packet-parsing functionality of Cesanta Mongoose 6.13. It is a heap-based buffer over-read in a parse_mqtt getu16 call. A specially crafted MQTT SUBSCRIBE packet can cause an arbitrary out-of-bounds memory read potentially resulting in information disclosure and denial of service. An attacker needs to send a specially crafted MQTT packet over the network to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: smplayer: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
